>>>>> "ramsub4" == ramsub4  <ramsub4@...> writes:

    ramsub4> In our application, the server is capable returning either
    ramsub4> JSON or XML. JSON is the default. Now, if we want to access
    ramsub4> a resource, what is the best way the client can specify the
    ramsub4> response format to the server?

    ramsub4>   /endpoint/<ep_id>?format=XML or /endpoint/<ep_id/xml

    ramsub4> What's the preferred way? Why?

Use the Accept header.

-- 
Cheers,

Berend de Boer
